about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Frontend Engineer
about.description:
A frontend-focused engineer with 3+ years of experience building modern, production-ready web applications using React, Next.js, and TypeScript. I’m passionate about crafting clean, fast, and accessible user interfaces with a strong attention to UI quality and user experience.

Over the years, I’ve worked on SaaS dashboards, marketing websites, and client-facing web applications, focusing on performance, maintainability, and reusable component design.

I also have a basic understanding of backend technologies such as Node.js and Express, gained through personal projects, which helps me collaborate effectively and integrate frontend applications with APIs.

Currently, I’m working on a personal tech product while continuously improving my frontend skills and seeking opportunities to contribute to impactful, user-focused products.
